ART BY SAMUEL

Samuel's Story



My name is Samuel Canfield Chasan. I have sold thousands of dollars worth of my own artwork, have generated over 2 billion video views, and won a Guinness World Record.



I am currently pursuing my Masters in Professional Studies at the Interactive Telecommunications Program at NYU. Students combine digital media, art, engineering, and fabrication methods in pursuit of their interests. I for example built this website.

About Samuel
